name: Christmas Poppers Mania
description:
Get ready for a Winter-ful Christmas BLAST with our brand new, fun-filled and incredibly exciting chain reaction game ‘Christmas Poppers Puzzle’!

Pop, tap and crush your way through almost 800 highly addictive Christmas puzzles and the much-dreaded wait until Christmas Eve will be over in a flash this year.

Anticipating Santa Claus has never been this exhilarating:

* CHALLENGING PUZZLES - Pop all chocolate truffles with just a limited number of taps.

* CHOCOLATE-Y WONDERLAND - Journey through amazing, snowy and frozen landscapes without even getting out into the cold. Emerge into a world of festive jingles and Christmas-y feelings from the comfort of your home.

No need to wait any longer, download it now and join in on the fun. Don’t forget to share with your beloved friends and family!

Share and enjoy,
Wishing you a very merry Christmas from your AppChocolate Team

Got some feedback about our apps? Then send us a Chocolate truffle (or a message) on http://www.appchocolate.com
